item.title: One of the Most Satisfying Things!
item.description: A machine moves through the field to neatly separate and mark the corn rows, creating clean, uniform lines that are surprisingly satisfying to watch.

media:content.media:title: One of the Most Satisfying Things!
media:content.media:description: A machine moves through the field to neatly separate and mark the corn rows, creating clean, uniform lines that are surprisingly satisfying to watch.

item.title: Smashing bales and watermelon while mowing the yard
item.description: Using a John Deere S780, the crew mows the yard and runs over a few bales and a watermelon along the way, showing how the machine handles the debris.

item.title: How a Burnt Combine Looks Like!
item.description: Laura takes a closer look at a combine that was damaged by fire, showing the extent of the burn and what remains of the machine.

item.title: Back When I Finished The Corn Planting!
item.description: A look back at the moment the corn planting wrapped up, marking an important milestone in the season’s work on the farm.

item.title: Am I Doing This Right?
item.description: Laura takes the Toro 2000 HDX for a spin, figuring out the controls and learning how to handle the machine out in the field.

item.title: Giving Our Corn to the People!
item.description: Laura and the team hand out fresh corn straight from the farm, sharing the harvest with the community and spreading some homegrown joy.

item.title: I Have to Mow My Lawn Fast!
item.description: Learn the essential steps to mowing your lawn fast without sacrificing quality. This guide breaks down the best patterns and tricks to slash your mowing time in half.

item.title: Field Fire in the Corn Field!
item.description: Laura deals with a sudden fire spreading through the corn field, acting fast to contain the flames and protect the crops.

item.title: World's Biggest Combine Doesn't Mess Around!
item.description: Go inside the world of huge harvest equipment. We'll show you why this massive combine is an unbelievable workhorse, detailing its power and the speed it maintains during the busiest season.

item.title: That's a Good Looking Tractor!
item.description: What makes a tractor truly stand out? This video documents a full tour and review of a visually stunning tractor, showing off its design, features, and powerful performance in the field.

item.title: A Big Work in Progress!
item.description: This video documents the current state of a massive project, showing the hard work, challenges, and exciting progress of a huge task that is currently a big work in progress.

item.title: How We Use Our *New* Dump Truck
item.description: The new truck is here! Join us for a full look at the features and capabilities of our new dump truck and see how we put it to the test on challenging hauling jobs.

item.title: Can The Ranger Do It?
item.description: Go inside a high-stakes challenge. This video documents the suspenseful moments as we push the Ford Ranger (or Army Ranger) to its absolute limit to see if it has the power to get the job done.

item.title: Millions of Pounds of Corn | Pepper Gets A Ride!
item.description: A massive corn harvest is underway! This video documents the challenge of dealing with millions of pounds of corn

item.title: Using Chopping & Destroying Blades!
item.description: This video is a guide to heavy-duty cutting. We'll show you the machinery and techniques required to use high-power chopping blades to destroy and dismantle materials safely and efficiently.

item.title: Coolest Truck Ever!
item.description: This video is a full review and deep-dive into an unforgettable custom truck. We’ll show you why this vehicle stands out from the rest, covering its design, power, and innovative features.

item.title: We Remodeled Our Lawn!
item.description: What happens when you decide to remodel your entire lawn? This video documents the huge project, showing the before-and-after transformation and the hard work it took to get the perfect result.

item.title: Off the farm for a quick weekend to run the 2025 NYC Marathon. That was hard! I want to do it again.
item.description: I traded the fields for the streets to run the 2025 NYC Marathon! This video documents the journey, the challenge of the race, and the feeling of finishing the hardest race yet.

item.title: Our Cornfield is a Giant Solar Panel!
item.description: This video looks at the incredible energy capture of our crops. We’ll show you the full growth cycle and explain why a healthy cornfield acts like a massive, organic solar panel in the summer sun.

item.title: Farming with Airplanes?
item.description: What does farming with airplanes actually look like? This video goes inside the world of crop dusters and aerial application, showing the surprising efficiency and precision of using aircraft for major farm work.
